label: 琵琶
対訳語: A short-necked Japanese lute related to the Chinese pipa
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: The biwa has a pearshaped body with a shallow, rounded back and either four or five silk strings attached to slender lateral tuning pegs. It is played by plucking with a large, flared plectrum.
